Data Science Workshop in 91

Presented by Susheel, on 7th August 2019 @ 91Springboard Noida

Summary

It is incredibly difficult not to get too technical and keep the content friendly for all, especially in such a diverse data Science centric topic. Yet we saw Sushseel along with Krishna and Nitin drove the conversation from Data collections to data visualization and decision making.

There were live demos of object detection, OCR, image colourization, Deep learning cars, along with discussing latest tools, and resources available in these domains. We ended up with the long daunting conversation about how privacy is just a myth ;)
